metadata.title: CVE-2024-46802 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: added NULL check at start of dc_validate_stream[Why]prevent invalid memory access[How]check if dc and stream are NULL

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
